headline: Teledyne Space Imaging Announces Availability of Upscreened Sensors for Space: EMs and Evaluation Kits Ready by End of 2025
summary: GRENOBLE, France, November 14, 2025--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), a leading provider of advanced imaging solutions, is proud to announce that Engineering Models (EMs) of its newly launched industrial CMOS image sensors—upscreened for space applications—will be available along with evaluation kits and integration tools by the end of 2025.
